main event: A group of witnesses observed a pulsating football-shaped object in Lewisburg, Indiana on March 30, 1966.
interesting points: Witnesses described the object as increasing in size from the size of a softball to a beachball,The object emitted a pulsating white light with flashes of red and blue,The sound from the object increased in frequency and volume as it approached,One witness stated they initially ridiculed UFO reports but became convinced after the sighting,The object disappeared rapidly after changing direction away from the observers.
witness description: Witnessed by a group including a mother and her children.
